Dear Frank,
Thanks for your email. My friend Lily and I have a good trip in Beijing. We visit many interesting places and go shopping on Wangfujing Street. When we are in Beijing,we live in our Chinese friend Liu Ming's house. Have a look at our activities  there.
On May 1stArrive in Beijing at 10:00 am.
On May 2ndVisit the Great Wall with Liu Ming.
On May 3rdVisit the Summer Palace
On May 4thVisit the Palace Museum with Liu Ming and his sister.
On May 5thGo shopping on Wangfujing Street and buy presents for our families. Lily buys a toy for her brother Jack and a postcard for her sister Lucy. I buy two cups for my father and a silk shirt for my mother.
On May 6thSay goodbye to Beijing.
Hope you will go with us next time.
Yours,
Nancy
